thread.section_title: The Bentley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hospitality & Service Superior
thread.title_full: Hospitality & Service Superior - Review of The Bentley Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pjm557
title: Hospitality & Service Superior
text: Martin & Chantall were extremely helpful and went above and beyond to assure customer satisfaction. I was in the hospitality industry for over 15 years and know first hand the challenges that can be experienced with guests. I will be sure to refer Colleagues and friends to the Bentley!
